item.description:
Exploring Biotech Export Opportunities in Brazil (Webinar)

When: Tuesday, June 5, 2012 at 1:00 pm EST/10:00 am PST

Learn more and register on the Event Webpage.

 

https://emenuapps.ita.doc.gov/ePublic/newWebinarRegistration.jsp?SmartCode=2Q8H


The biotechnology sector in Brazil continues to experience an episode of significant expansion. The U.S. Commercial Service office will host a webinar on "Exploring Biotech Export Opportunities in Brazil". This webinar will inform on best sales prospects, latest investments and partnership opportunities, clinical trial landscape, regulatory process, Intellectual Property protection, customs clearance, BioPartnering Latin America Conference held September 2012, and much more.

 

Questions? Please contact Gabriela.Zelaya@trade.gov or call 408-535-2757, ext.107
item.name: Exploring Biotech Export Opportunities in Brazil (Webinar)
